articles.title: "Disrespect started way before any interview": DeMarcus Cousins takes shots at James Harden for demeaning... - The Sportsrush
articles.description: DeMarcus Cousins called out James Harden for the disrespect all season long. He said the Beard hadn't given his new teammates any chance of gelling. Following their second blowout loss to the Lakers last night, Harden publicly demanded a trade. He said he did…
articles.content:
DeMarcus Cousins called out James Harden for the disrespect all season long. He said the Beard hadn’t given his new teammates any chance of gelling.
